short_summary: Restoration of Cavendish Grove Stream and removal of the Balsam Hollow Brook culvert
description: Parks Canada seeks a qualified contractor to restore a waterway in Cavendish Grove and demolish a nearby culvert. The successful bid will involve supplying all necessary materials, equipment, labor, and transportation for the project.

full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

## Competition Information

### Project Overview

Parks Canada is seeking a qualified contractor for a waterway restoration project at Balsam Hollow Brook, located within Prince Edward Island National Park, near Cavendish, PE. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

*   Dewatering and pumping
*   Removal of a gravel access road and culvert (approximately 11m long)
*   Construction of earthen berms
*   Supply and placement of boulder clusters, rootwads, and woody debris

### Project Timeline

Completion Date: October 15, 2023. In-water related work must be completed by September 30, 2023.

### Bid Instructions

Bid submissions will be received by fax or email. Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.

*   The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.
*   Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid due to file size.
*   Bidders must send grouped emails (if necessary) and clearly label the subject line with the solicitation number and project name.
*   Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted. Bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

### Additional Information

*   An optional site visit will take place on August 9th, 2023, at 10:00 AM local time (ADT). Interested bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority before the site visit.
*   National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

### Contact Information

Crown Corporation: Parks Canada Agency

Address: 111 Water Street East, Cornwall, ON K6H 6S2
Email: [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 585-3836
Fax: 1-855-983-1808

Notice URL: None

Attachments:

*   ITQ Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7856/itq-stage-1-5p468-23-0131a.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7856/itq-stage-1-5p468
